language-server-protocol-explained.title: language server protocol explained
language-server-protocol-explained.intro:
Language server protocol (LSP) is a protocol for both programming languages and text editors. This session introduces what kind of features LSP offers and how it can be implemented on the IDEs and possibly languages. 

----
[Collaborative notes on HackMD](https://hackmd.io/c/coscup18-source/%2Fcoscup18-source-language-server-protocol-explained)
language-server-protocol-explained.audience: text editor plugin hackers, language tool hackers, language designers and all those wannabees
